column1: Piwik hostname, optionally including a path e.g. piwik.example.com or example.com/piwik
column2: Piwik hostname, optionally including a path e.g. piwik.example.com or example.com/piwik

column1: Listed under Settings/Website in your Piwik administration panel
column2: Listed under Settings/Website in your Piwik administration panel

column1: Enable tracking of outlinks and downloads
column2: Enable tracking of outlinks and downloads

column1: Delay for link tracking in milliseconds
column2: Delay for link tracking in milliseconds

column1: Send logged in customers ID to Piwik
column2: Send logged in customers ID to Piwik

column1: Path to the Piwik tracker Javascript. Usually "piwik.js".
column2: Path to the Piwik tracker Javascript. Usually "piwik.js".

column1: Path to the Piwik tracker PHP script. Usually "piwik.php".
column2: Path to the Piwik tracker PHP script. Usually "piwik.php".

column1: Hostname for serving the Piwik tracker Javascript. May be left empty in which case the regular hostname will be used.
column2: Hostname for serving the Piwik tracker Javascript. May be left empty in which case the regular hostname will be used.
